title: Australian shares set to open higher on c.bank rate cut hopes
text:
Australian shares set to open higher on c.bank rate cut hopes

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 08:31)

© Reuters. Australian shares set to open higher on c.bank rate cut hopes Sept 20 (Reuters) - Australian shares are set to open higher on Friday as investor sentiment found support on expectations of more central bank stimulus, following weak employment data. Energy stocks will also likely firm as oil prices rose overnight on fears that the strikes on Saudi Arabia's oil facilities could result in a longer-than-expected supply disruptions. O/R The local index futures YAPcm1 rose 0.15%, a 3.5-point premium to the underlying S&P/ASX 200 index close. The benchmark rose 0.5% on Thursday. New Zealand's benchmark S&P/NZX 50 index rose 0.1% in early trade.

Australian shares set to open higher on c.bank rate cut hopes
description: Australian shares set to open higher on c.bank rate cut hopes
